column4: My wireless has stopped picking up signals after someone came to our house and gave us a new modem and set us up for Comcast Digital Phone Service. Wireless was previously working with the ath5k fix...I've run through the procedure to set that up again and it still won't work
anyone?
please?
Otherwise known as Wubi... ;)
actually it sets up a virtual disk which ubuntu thinks is a partition
indeed, a real operating system run on the idea of a virtual machine
can you try and hlep me fix my wireless?
what's up with  it?
I was previously using the ath5k fix, everything was working fine. But now someone came to the house to install Comcast Digital Phone service, and gave us a new modem..now my wireless won't work
I've followed the original steps to try and set up ath5k again, still not working
erm... Have you contacted Comcast about it?
nay, my father's Vista is working just fine. He didn't have to change anything on his computer
that's an odd one, can you give me some specs for you and your dad's computer then?
what kind of specs?
well most particularly
hrm, I'm using Atheros 5007 I believe
ah, infamous atheros
aye
well I'm not very good with telecom technology so I probably can't help, sorry
its ok, thanks for the attempt, looks like I've grabbed the attention of a few others anyway
what about a kernel update or something? it might work
